name: Traceur's Dreamlab VR
description:
Traceur's Dreamlab is - as the name implies - a place to be for every parkour runner!
You can build your own levels, including not only challenging obstacles but also tricky puzzles and share them with the community.
Within our leaderboard system you can run against the time of your friends and other online players.

Features:

  • Unique leveleditor
  • Online leaderboards
  • Ingame workshop support for level sharing
  • Tricky puzzles
  • Challenging parkours
  • A bunch of Premade Levels
  • Rotation options against motion sickness
